item.title: Rails delegation and N+1
item.description: Profile has many ApiResponses def api_response order(‘id desc’).first end makes multiple queirers n+1 use rails has_one :api_response -> order(‘id desc’) this searchs api_responses for profile_id and returns the first, we just need to make sure we order for the one we want.
